description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Lazy Caverns is a platform game.If you like retro game ,this game is for you. History: Suddenly Roby kid's go to the caves and is lost.Save him,collect all keys on each levels and  go to the door to next levels.
